Mr. Fang,I am very slow in PinYin. Although I can ...

Thanks for reply, as I said by Chinese language here, I out of China for 15 years... Yes What I can do? I can work on internet, I can teach languages...
Other word, I can live, I am fine, in English countries will be better for me, Not English countries, also ok, just don't be in war or big chaos... Like Gambia, Sudan.. Cambodia, Laos... All of those countries are much better than Xi's PRC scan faces everyday!

Any idea please?
